ExampleDefinition.Title: Using PaletteProvider
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use the IPaletteProvider inteface to colour lines and points individually. Using this interface you can colour a line, Column, Ohlc or Candlestick chart depending on a point value - useful for showing thresholds or areas of interest!
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Using PaletteProvider</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to use the IPaletteProvider inteface to colour lines and points individually. Using this interface you can colour a line, Column, Ohlc or Candlestick chart depending on a point value - useful for showing thresholds or areas of interest!</Run>
